body: part 3 is unlikely and this is like an open-ended ending. if there's a part 3, my speculation is... it would be just boring all day and all night sex and possibly informing the husband that they will divorce or someth. this is how NTR generally progresses. in anyways, in the end, the wife will be broken and will indulge in the feelings of pleasure. another speculation is that - after she gets preggy, she'll come back and fuck the husband to make him think it was his child. after that, she'll fuck the other guy again until she gives birth... and who knows, most likely, they'll still do it after that.

she really chose hard sex and commit adultery over lovey dovey sex with the man she loves or loved i guess. This will definetly make her feel like shit sooner or later. Came back cause i liked the art better than the first part
Wew just bcz he said aishiteru she allow him to kiss her wtf
lol i think the people who hate NTR will never learn they always think that the good guy can win in NTR or the girl feel bad and that will never happen

@bbdo thanks for the info! and from what you said i do hope that the author doesnt keep this a generic NTR but instead progress and develops the drama and the story into something better and add some depth into it. I dont care about how it ends either in a good note ntr note or bad note as long as it doesnt stay generic and plain

@stylez479 What's up man! From what I found on other sites, it has only been the first two parts that have been available in JP and CH for some time now and now just today we got the english version for part 1 and most likely will get part 2 in english soon! However, it appears that part 3 is still in the works. I don't know if you have read the author's other works but his other vanilla works have quite a bit of depth and and story and some drama compared to most hentai, but I do agree with your other comment in part 1, her naivety is really high for someone of her age and considering how she still works, it appears she doesn't spend as much time with her husband as they should. Her husband did warn her, so it shows that his head is not in the clouds like most others. I just hope the author writes a bit more into the story and drama and not make it the generic ntr we usually see and based on his previous works I have some hope for that, but we'll see when part 3 eventually comes out.
